goal: My colleague's flight, FlyUnified FU789 from Chicago (ORD) to San Diego (SAN), is scheduled for the 10th of August. Can you find its scheduled arrival time and then create an event on my calendar to 'Leave for airport to pick up Maya' that is set for 90 minutes before the flight's arrival?

evals.description: Verify that an event was successfully added to the calendar.
Verify that the title of the created calendar event is correct.
evals.query: contains(gocalendar.differences.events.added.values(@)[0].title, 'Leave for airport to pick up Maya')

evals.description: Verify the exact start time of the calendar event, which should be 90 minutes before the flight's scheduled arrival.
